edus2 wiki updates, probe design

Published on Wednesday, February 01, 2012 in edus2

The edus2 wiki underwent a lot of changes over the weekend. A set of step-by-step instructions has been added to the Installation page. Anyone that has some experience with the command line should have no problem with it.

The weak link with the system right now is making a nice-looking probe. My colleague/friend/cousin Erik Kulyk has decided to help out with the project and is looking in to a professionally fabricated probe.

The outstanding Issues now include:

  • Probe design
  • Automation of the initial setup process
  • Ubuntu package for quick installation

paul.kulyk@gmail.com
